name: Ghirardelli Square Hotel
proximityToAttractions: Located right next to Ghirardelli Square, just a short walk from Fisherman's Wharf and the Golden Gate Bridge
neighborhoodSafety: Safe and secure neighborhood with 24-hour security
climateControl: Individual climate control in each room
recentReview: Excellent hotel with great staff and a perfect location.
restaurant: On-site restaurant offering a variety of cuisines
petPolicy: Pet-friendly hotel with pet walking and sitting services
shuttleService: Complimentary shuttle service to popular attractions
viewAndSurroundings: Stunning views of the bay and surrounding cityscape
